Common name: 1. You must enter the common name (preferably with a species EPPO code and the variety). You can find the EPPO code here:
2. You must fill in all fields marked MANDATORY
3. Choose a value from the specified lists where appropriate. Net weight can have up to 1 decimal place
4. You must use the country code for the country of origin - you can find the 2 letter country code here:
The only exceptions to this list are:
5. Do not use extra commas as this will create errors when you try to upload the file
6. When you've finished, make sure you delete the example data including the mandatory/optional note on row 2 and these guidance notes
7. Save this file as a .CSV and upload it
